meanings.definition: Characteristic of a dandy; excessively concerned with fashion and appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her dandiacal outfit caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: The fashion model's dandiacal style was admired by many.
meanings.sent3: He took his dandiacal obsession with hats to a whole new level.
meanings.sent4: The dandiacal display of wealth was evident in her extravagant lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The dandiacal man's appearance was as carefully crafted as a work of art.

meanings.definition: Behaving or dressing in a showy or extravagant manner.
meanings.sent1: The dandiacal peacock strutted proudly in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She always had a dandiacal flair in her choice of accessories.
meanings.sent3: His dandiacal antics at the party amused everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The dandiacal display of fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: Her dandiacal gestures were like a performance on a grand stage.
